Text: Got Talent Portugal (season 5) was the 5th season of the talent show Got Talent Portugal, Portuguese version of the hit got talent show Britain's Got Talent.
Triplets:<Got Talent Portugal
1:
--------------------
Text: Got Talent Portugal (season 5):  Each judge can press the golden buzzer once in the auditions same as last year, such as the hosts.
Triplets:<Got Talent Portugal

<Text: Got Talent Portugal (season 5):  This year a new rule was made, the judges can give a unanimous golden buzzer that means the 3 judges can press the buzzer at the same time.>
